DOC.brief_summary: To test influence rapid versus slow ingestion mixed meal insulin incretin hormone secretion healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Rapid Versus Slow Ingestion Mixed Meal : Influence Islet Incretin Hormone Secretion Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: A mixed meal ( 524 kcal ) ingest rapidly ( within 5 min ) slowly ( 10-15 min ) change insulin , glucagon , GIP GLP-1 level follow subsequent 300 min
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject Diabetes Liver disease Kidney disease Thyroid disease
